com.yworks.yfiles.view.input

Class ConstrainedHandle

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.yworks.yfiles.view.input.ConstrainedDragHandler<IHandle>
      • com.yworks.yfiles.view.input.ConstrainedHandle
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IDragHandler, IHandle

    public abstract class ConstrainedHandle
extends ConstrainedDragHandler<IHandle>
implements IHandle
    A convenience implementation of the IHandle interface that can be used to constrain the handle of an item.
    See Also:
    ConstrainedDragHandler, ConstrainedDragHandler.constrainNewLocation(IInputModeContext, com.yworks.yfiles.geometry.PointD, com.yworks.yfiles.geometry.PointD)
